pages.text: This adds a Subnautica theme to the oceans and some of it's gear and even a minisub!
Dive underwater in oceans and break the nodes you find (even a bare hand works!) for resources.
You can breathe much longer and safer underwater in a wetsuit. Combine this with your Seamoth minisub and you can stay down there forever. Just watch out for sharks and Leviathans!
